title: UK's sluggish economy to grow a bit more quickly - Finance Minister Hammond
text:
UK's sluggish economy to grow a bit more quickly - Finance Minister Hammond 1:22pm EDT - 00:50 
UK Finance Minister Philip Hammond says the country's economy will grow slightly faster than previously thought in the run-up to Brexit. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
UK Finance Minister Philip Hammond says the country's economy will grow slightly faster than previously thought in the run-up to Brexit. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
